page.title: 09WEST COKER LAW AND ORDER
page.content: IN OUR AREA THERE ARE ABOUT 20/30 CRIMES A YEAR,THE CRIMES INCLUDE DAMAGE TO CARS,GRAFFITI,HOUSE BREAKINGS AND FACTORY BREAKINGS.THERE WAS AN ATTEMPED ROBBERY AT EAST CHINNOCK POST OFFICE BUT THIS WAS UNSUCESSFUL. A MAN WITH A GUN DEMANDED MONEY BUT A PERSON WORKING IN THE BACK OF THE SHOP CAME OUT WITH A TOY GUN AND FRIGHTENED THE ROBBER AWAY. MOST CRIMES ARE THEFT OF MONEY. THE POLICEMAN IN OUR AREA MADE 2 ARRESTS LAST WEEK,ONE OF THEM WAS AN ASSULT ON A BOY. THE MAN WHO DID THIS BROKE 2 TEETH. THE POLICEMAN MAKES ABOUT 12 ARRESTS EACH YEAR. THE POLICEMAN HAS NOT BEEN ATTACKED. HE WAS INVOLVED IN THE MINERS STRIKE FOR A TOTAL OF 9 WEEKS,ONE WEEK EVERY MONTH.
